00018 class StepNCRectangularPocket : public   IWorkCycle
00019 {
00020 public:
00021   StepNCRectangularPocket(IWorkCycles * owner=NULL) ;
00022   virtual ~StepNCRectangularPocket(){}
00023   virtual HRESULT DeriveParameters(IStepNodePtr pExecutable, IStepNodePtr pFeature, IStepNodePtr pOpItem);
00024   virtual HRESULT LoadIntoStep();
00025   virtual HRESULT Create(IStepNodePtr /*type==project*/, CString opname);
00026   virtual void InitValues(CCannedCycleItems *pItems){}
00027   BEGIN_STEP_MAP(StepNCRectangularPocket)
00028 
00029     ENTRYSET(_T("Type"),        Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::String,    _T(""), _T("RectangularPocket"))
00030 
00031     // These build up the tree - these must be in the proper order
00032     ENTRY(_T("Feature"),        Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_feature"))   
00033     ENTRY(_T("Operation"),        Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_operation"))
00034     ENTRY(_T("SecurityPlane"),      Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_secplane/position"))
00035     ENTRY(_T("FeaturePlacement"),   Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_feature/feature_placement"))
00036     ENTRY(_T("Depth"),          Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_feature/depth/position"))
00037     ENTRY(_T("MachiningStrategy"),    Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_operation/its_machining_strategy"))
00038     ENTRY(_T("FeatureBoundary"),    Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_feature/feature_boundary"))
00039     ENTRY(_T("BottomCondition"),    Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_feature/bottom_condition"))
00040     // diameter/implicit_tolerance/  :: PLUS_MINUS_VALUE(0.100,0.100,3)
00041 
00042     ENTRY(_T("FeatureName"),      Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::String,    _T("its_id"))
00043     ENTRY(_T("ReferencePlane"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[2]"))
00044     ENTRY(_T("RetractPlane"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Position,  _T("retract_plane"))
00045     ENTRY(_T("SafetyPlane"),      Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Position,  _T("its_secplane/position/location/coordinates[2]"))
00046     ENTRY(_T("AbsDepth"),       Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("depth/position/location/coordinates[2]"))
00047 
00048     ENTRY(_T("CenterAbscissa"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[0]"))
00049     ENTRY(_T("CenterOrdinate"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[1]"))
00050     ENTRY(_T("StartAbscissa"),      Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[0]"))
00051     ENTRY(_T("StartOrdinate"),      Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[1]"))
00052     ENTRY(_T("PlacementRefDirection"),  Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Vector,    _T("feature_placement/ref_direction/direction_ratios"))
00053     ENTRY(_T("Location"),       Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Vector,    _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates"))
00054     ENTRY(_T("Axis"),         Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Vector,    _T("feature_placement/axis/direction_ratios"))
00055     ENTRY(_T("ReferenceDirection"),   Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Vector,    _T("feature_placement/ref_direction/direction_ratios"))
00056 
00057     ENTRY(_T("Length"),         Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Length,    _T("feature_boundary/profile_length/theoretical_size"))
00058     ENTRY(_T("Width"),          Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Length,    _T("feature_boundary/profile_width/theoretical_size"))
00059     ENTRY(_T("CornerRadius"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Length,    _T("orthogonal_radius/theoretical_size"))
00060     ENTRY(_T("PlanarRadius"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Length,    _T("planar_radius/theoretical_size"))
00061     ENTRY(_T("Slope"),          Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Length,    _T("slope"))
00062 
00063     ENTRY(_T("FinishAllowanceDepth"), Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("allowance_bottom"))
00064     ENTRY(_T("FinishAllowanceSide"),  Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("allowance_side"))
00065     ENTRY(_T("MaxOneInfeedDepth"),    Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("axial_cutting_depth"))
00066     ENTRY(_T("Stepdown"),       Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("axial_cutting_depth"))
00067     ENTRY(_T("Stepover"),       Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("radial_cutting_depth"))
00068 
00069     ENTRY(_T("CutterComp"),       Cycle::Operation, Cycle::String,    _T("its_technology/feedrate_reference"))
00070     ENTRY(_T("InfeedFeedrate"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Feed,    _T("its_technology/feedrate"))
00071     ENTRY(_T("StepSpeed"),        Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Speed,   _T("its_technology/spindle"))
00072     ENTRY(_T("StepFeedrate"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Feed,    _T("its_technology/feedrate"))
00073 
00074     //project/main_workplan/its_elements/its_elements[1]/its_operation/its_machine_functions/coolant/
00075     //project/main_workplan/its_elements/its_elements[1]/its_operation/its_machine_functions/mist/
00076     //project/main_workplan/its_elements/its_elements[1]/its_operation/its_machine_functions/chip_removal/
00077     ENTRY(_T("Angle"),          Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::Angle,   _T("Angle = acos(Dot(Vector(1,0,0), PlacementRefDirection)) * 180.0 / M_PI;"))
00078     ENTRY(_T("CycleType"),        Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::Long,    _T("CycleType = 1.0 + Find(Operation, \")finish\"")) 
00079     LINK(StepNCTooling)
00080 
00081   END_STEP_MAP(StepNCRectangularPocket)
00082 
00083   BEGIN_VERIFY_PARAMETER_MAP(StepNCRectangularPocket)
00084     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CutterComp != \"TCP\"") , _T(""))
00085     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Dwell < 0.0") , _T("DWELL_TIME_MUST_NOT_BE_NEGATIVE"))
00086     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("RetractPlane <= ReferencePlane") , _T(""))
00087     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("ReferencePlane <= AbsDepth") ,  _T(""))
00088     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Feedrate <= 0.0") ,  _T(""))
00089     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Speed <= 0.0") ,  _T(""))
00090     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Toollength < (ReferencePlane - AbsDepth)") ,  _T(""))
00091     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Overcut != 0.0") ,  _T("CENTER_DRILLING_MUST_NOT_HAVE_OVERCUT_LENGTH"))
00092     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CuttingDepth < 0.0") ,  _T("CUTTING_DEPTH_MUST_BE_POSITIVE"))
00093     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CuttingDepth > ( fabs(AbsDepth - ReferencePlane)") ,  _T("CUTTING_DEPTH_MUST_NOT_BE_GREATER_THAN_DEPTH"))
00094     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("RetractionFeedrate<=0.0") ,  _T("FEED_ON_RETRACE_MUST_NOT_BE_NEGATIVE_OR_TINY"))
00095     
00096   END_VERIFY_PARAMETER_MAP(StepNCRectangularPocket)
00097   IStepNodePtr _project;  /*type==project*/
00098 };
00099 FEATURE_DECLARE_SMARTPOINTER(StepNCRectangularPocket);
00100 
00101 inline StepNCRectangularPocket::StepNCRectangularPocket(IWorkCycles * owner) :   IWorkCycle(owner)
00102 { 
00103   _parent=owner;
00104   InitStepItems(&items);
00105   InitTests(this);
00106 
00107 }
00108 inline HRESULT StepNCRectangularPocket::DeriveParameters(IStepNodePtr pExecutable, IStepNodePtr pFeature, IStepNodePtr pOpItem)
00109 {
00110   IWorkCycle::DeriveParameters(pExecutable, pFeature, pOpItem);
00111   CCannedCycleItems * items = GetStepMap();  // initialize output for now...  
00112 
00113   items->SetVariable(_T("CycleType"),  1) ;
00114 
00115   items->SetVariable(_T("Feedrate"), items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepFeedrate")) * 1000.0 * 60.0) ;
00116   items->SetVariable(_T("RetractionFeedrate"), items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepFeedrate")) * 1000.0 * 60.0) ;
00117   items->SetVariable(_T("SafetyPlane"), 2.0) ;
00118   items->SetVariable(_T("Speed"), fabs(items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepSpeed")))) ;
00119   items->SetVariable(_T("SpindleDir"), 3.0 + (items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepSpeed"))>=0)) ;
00120 
00121   // if tooling is wrong revise items list before calling this.
00122   //_toolnum= DeriveToolParameters( pFeature,  pOpItem);
00123 
00124 
00125   SanityCheck() ;
00126   debugstream << GetStepMap()->ToString();
00127   return S_OK;
00128 }
00129 
00130 inline HRESULT StepNCRectangularPocket::Create(IStepNodePtr project, CString opname)
00131 {
00132   if(project==NULL)
00133     return E_INVALIDARG;
00134 
00135   if(project->GetClassname() !=_bstr_t( L"project"))
00136     return E_INVALIDARG; // throw std::exception(_T("Bad project node"));
00137 
00138   INodeListPtr its_elements = project->GetAttributeNodeList(_bstr_t(L"/main_workplan/its_elements"));
00139   _pExecutable= its_elements->push_back(_bstr_t(L"machining_workingstep"), _bstr_t(L""));
00140 
00141   items.ClearDirtyFlags(); 
00142 
00143   return S_OK;
00144 }
00145 
00146 inline HRESULT StepNCRectangularPocket::LoadIntoStep() 
00147 { 
00148 //  CAddons addons((Eproject *) gProject.get());
00149   CCannedCycleItems * items = GetStepMap();  
00150   StepNCTooling tooling;
00151   tooling.DeriveParameters(items, _pExecutable); 
00152 
00153   IWorkCycle::LoadWSIntoStep(gProject);
00154   // FILL IN MISSING PARTS
00155 
00156   // Angle will have to be added as a  simplifying concept
00157   // Angle = acos(Dot(Vector(1,0,0), PlacementRefDirection)) * 180.0 / M_PI;
00158   if(items->IsDirty(_T("Angle")))
00159   {
00160     double a = items->GetValue<double>(_T("Angle")) * M_PI/180.0 ;
00161     // translate into step 
00162     Vector v   = Vector(1,0,0) * RotateZ(a) ;
00163     items->SetVariable(_T("ReferenceDirection"), (Vector) v) ;
00164 
00165   }
00166   if(items->IsDirty(_T("CCW")))
00167   {
00168     double ccw = (items->GetValue<long>(_T("CCW")) > 0) ? -1 : 1;
00169     items->SetVariable(_T("StepSpeed"), ccw * items->GetValue<double>(_T("Speed"))) ;  
00170 
00171   }
00172   if(!items->IsDirty(_T("Cutmode")))
00173   {
00174     items->SetVariable(_T("Cutmode"), (LPCTSTR) _T(".climb."));
00175     // project/main_workplan/its_elements/its_elements[3]/its_operation/its_machining_strategy/*/cutmode
00176   }
00177   if(items->IsDirty(_T("CycleType")))
00178   {
00179     CString str = (LPCTSTR) items->GetValue<tstring>(_T("Climb")).c_str();
00180     if(str==_T("rough"))
00181     {
00182       items->SetVariable(_T("Operation"), _T("bottom_and_side_rough_milling")) ;  
00183     }
00184     else
00185     {
00186       items->SetVariable(_T("Operation"), _T("bottom_and_side_finish_milling")) ;  
00187 
00188     }
00189 
00190   } 
00191   return S_OK; 
00192 }
